subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Against a formidable field, Anthony Kim, 22, set a tournament scoring record of 16-under-par 272 on the difficult Quail Hollow Country Club at the Wachovia Championship.
snippet: Against a formidable field, Anthony Kim, 22, set a tournament scoring record of 16-under-par 272 on the difficult Quail Hollow Country Club at the Wachovia Championship.
